rooms.description: Provides a welcoming entrance and transition into the open-plan living area.
A spacious Mediterranean-inspired open plan that integrates the living and dining spaces with a fully integrated kitchen. Features large windows for natural light and airflow.
Adjacent to the open plan area, providing comfortable seating areas and a relaxation zone.
Semi-outdoor space for dining that overlooks the garden, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy.
Small storage and utility space for kitchen essentials, ensuring efficient workflow as per Mediterranean design ethos.

openings.description: Stylish wooden door with glass panels for natural light.
Provides ample daylight and enhances connectivity between indoors and outdoors.
Seamless connection to the garden area.
